version_description:
1, new recognition content "reading function"
2, optimize the text editing and editing operation
3, optimize the ID identification alignment box
——【中文更新提示】——
1，新增识别内容“朗读功能”
2，优化文本编辑编辑操作~
3，优化身份证识别对齐框~

1，优化文字扫描识别接口
2，新增扫描结果校对功能
3，支持扫描结果图文记录
4，升级翻译接口稳定翻译

1，优化图标和提示
2，修复部分小BUG
3，优化识别速度~

1、提升图片识别速度
2、优化部分页面
3、修改已知BUG

1, support "batch recognition"
2, repair small Bug, identify more fluency

- [repair scan identification Bug] -
Please update the old version of the user to the new edition in time!

1, scanning translation supports 104 kinds of speech
2, scanned translation unlimited number of words!
3, fully open the picture and text proofreading function!

1，修复：操作拍照》扫描》校对》提示“图片不存在不能校对”，只有退出扫描结果页重新进入才能进行校对。
2，修复：操作合并记录》删除/不删除》直接闪退Bug，重新进入合并已成功。
3，获取相机和相册权限语言重新组织规范下。
4，移除普通用户每日识别次数限制。
5，侧边栏新增所属用户分类。
6，视频iPhone X，和其他各机型。

1. Video IOS 13 and iPhone X Series Models
2. Fix known bugs and optimize product details
3. New "Thai, Vietnamese, Dutch" and other languages are added for character recognition
4. Optimize the identification interface, more accurate, stable and fast.
